steps.name: Data Analysis
steps.description: Analyze performance data to identify trends and areas for improvement.

steps.name: Evaluation Generation
steps.description: Generate performance evaluations based on the analysis of data and feedback.

steps.name: Create Contribution Goal
steps.description: Create specific, measurable contribution goals for team members based on performance data.

steps.name: Create Development Item
steps.description: Create development items to help team members improve their skills and performance.

steps.name: Update Contribution Goal
steps.description: Update contribution goals based on the progress made by team members.

steps.name: Update Development Item
steps.description: Update development items based on the progress made by team members.

steps.name: Timely Feedback
steps.description: Provide timely feedback to team members based on their performance and progress.

steps.name: Coaching
steps.description: Provide coaching and support to team members to help them achieve their goals and improve their performance.
